DataElement.preferredName: Antibiotic Antifungal Medication Past 2 Week Administered Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Related to the use of an antibiotic or antifungal agent over the past two weeks._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Antibiotic Antifungal Medication Past 2 Week Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Related to the use of an antibiotic or antifungal agent over the past two weeks.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A substance that kills microorganisms such as bacteria or mold, or stops them from growing and causing disease.:Drugs that treat infections caused by fungi.:A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Concepts.definition: Substances naturally produced by microorganisms or their derivatives that selectively target microorganisms not humans. Antibiotics kill or inhibit the growth of microorganisms by targeting components of the microbial cell absent from human cells, including bacterial cell walls, cell membrane, and 30S or 50S ribosomal subunits. These substances are used in the treatment of bacterial and other microbial infections.

Substances that treat systemic or topical infections caused by fungi. Antifungal agents kill or inhibit the growth of fungi, by various mechanisms. These mechanisms include inhibition of fungal mitosis, impairing synthesis or binding to ergosterol, inhibition of RNA or DNA synthesis, and interfering with other fungal metabolic processes.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::2:Any period of seven consecutive days.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
